summary: This document details the seizure of items from the safe at Jeffrey Epstein's residence located at 9 East 71st Street, New York, on August 7, 2019. The items included various forms of currency and binders containing discs, which were transferred to Richard Kahn's possession before being returned to the residence.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the accused in a child sex trafficking case, and items seized from his residence are detailed in this document.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as the individual who received items from Epstein's safe and later returned them to the residence.

connections.description: Richard Kahn is involved in the handling of items seized from Epstein's residence, indicating a working relationship.

events.title: Seizure of items from safe
events.description: Items were seized from the safe at Jeffrey Epstein's residence, including cash and binders with discs.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: Items seized included an Austrian passport with Epstein's photograph.
A total of $44,00 in cash was collected from the safe.
68 discs were found in binders during the seizure.
A yellow envelope marked 'SKI' containing assorted U.S. currency was also collected.
Items were transferred to Richard Kahn's possession before being returned to the residence.
